speaker: President. –
english: President. – The next item is the report ( A6-0074/2006 ) by Mr Mavrommatis, on behalf of the Committee on Culture and Education, on measures to promote multilingualism and language learning in the European Union: European Indicator of Language Competence ( 2005/2213(INI) ).
original: President. – The next item is the report ( A6-0074/2006 ) by Mr Mavrommatis, on behalf of the Committee on Culture and Education, on measures to promote multilingualism and language learning in the European Union: European Indicator of Language Competence ( 2005/2213(INI) ).
agenda_item: Promoting multilingualism and language learning in the EU (debate)
